Modules¶

news.views.approve_article(request, pk)¶

Approves an article so it can be published

Lets journalist create a new article.

Sends email about new article.

Displays home page.

Checks if user is editor.

news.views.is_journalist_user(user)¶

Checks if user is journalist.

news.views.is_reader_user(user)¶

Checks if user is reader/

news.views.post_to_x(article)¶

Posts article to X.

news.views.register(request)¶

Creates new user accounts.

news.views.review_articles(request)¶

Lets editor review articles.
